channel.title: Development Thread!
channel.description:
Hey There Guys. Im Lirim, searching for a Development Thread. The Server is already getting Hosted. I will need a Website Developer who is good with Graphics, PHP, HTML . Maybe if you could, CSS too. I need also a client + a Source Developer. The Server-Name i took is "Penthium". Add me on Skype "Lirimoo" if you would like some more informations. I will decide who joins and who not. I got 3 VPS's that are avaible for now, 1 is Taken. I will be hosting 3 Servers.
At all we will start with the Eco server. Check the Advertisement Section for Penthium. :') ♥

item.title: Development Thread!
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

Hey There Guys.
Im Lirim, searching for a Development Thread.
The Server is already getting Hosted.
I will need a Website Developer who is good with Graphics, PHP, HTML . Maybe if you could, CSS too.

Add me on Skype “Lirimoo” if you would like some more informations. I will decide who joins and who not.
